reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Node clone' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Node clone' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Node clone' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content authoring' menu link.
Click the 'Node clone module' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Node clone module dialog'.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '0f5e01bb2e16444' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 0f5e01bb2e16444 has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Clone this post' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Clone of 0f5e01bb2e16444 dialog'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post Clone of 0f5e01bb2e16444 has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Revisions' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Revisions dialog'.
Select 'Published' from the 'Change State' drop down list.
Enter 'Change state - Draft to Published' in the 'Message for state change' text area.
Click the 'Update State' button.
Verify success message of 'Clone of 0f5e01bb2e16444 transitioned to the published state.' is present.
Mouse over the work bench info container.
Verify the contextual link configure gear and down arrow link are visible.
Verify 'Configure Block' link is present.
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.

Enter '0f5e01bb2e16444' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.

Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.

Click the 'Clone this post' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Clone of 0f5e01bb2e16444 dialog'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post Clone of 0f5e01bb2e16444 has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Revisions' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Revisions dialog'.
Select 'Published' from the 'Change State' drop down list.
Enter 'Change state - Draft to Published' in the 'Message for state change' text area.
Click the 'Update State' button.
Verify success message of 'Clone of 0f5e01bb2e16444 transitioned to the published state.' is present.
Mouse over the work bench info container.
Verify the contextual link configure gear and down arrow link are visible.
